content: मेदुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मिद्-घुरच्] {@--1@} Fat. {@--2@} Smooth, unctuous, soft. {@--3@} Thick, dense; <ls>Māl. 8. 11</ls>; thick with, full of, covered with (usually with <ab>instr.</ab> or at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); मेघैर्मेदुरमंवरं <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; मकरंदसुंदरगलन्मंदाकिनीमेदुरं (पदारविंदं) {7}
